name: Abundance
oracle_text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

flavor_text: All Necrons bear the mark of the Triarch, a brand upon their living-metal skin that binds them to their dynasty.

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: In the late stages of Tyranid invasion, vast capillary towers funnel biomass to the Hive Ships waiting in orbit.

name: Hardened Scales
oracle_text: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
flavor_text: As the fusillade of lasgun fire bounced harmlessly off the carnifex's carapace, the creature roared and advanced.

name: Broodlord
oracle_text:
Ravenous (This creature enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.)
Brood Telepathy — When Broodlord enters the battlefield, distribute X +1/+1 counters among any number of other target creatures you control.

name: Old One Eye
oracle_text:
Trample
Other creatures you control have trample.
When Old One Eye enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 green Tyranid creature token.
Fast Healing — At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may discard two cards. If you do, return Old One Eye from your graveyard to your hand.

name: The First Tyrannic War
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)

II, III — Double the number of each kind of counter on target creature you control.

name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan // Etching of Kumano
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Shaman

card_faces.name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Kumano Faces Kakkazan deals 1 damage to each opponent and each planeswalker they control.
II — When you cast your next creature spell this turn, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
（于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。）
I — 熊野大战渴苛斩向每位对手和每个由对手操控的鹏洛客各造成1点伤害。
II — 本回合中，当你施放你的下一个生物咒语，该生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。
III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

card_faces.name: Etching of Kumano
card_faces.oracle_text:
Haste
If a creature dealt damage this turn by a source you controlled would die, exile it instead.
card_faces.printed_text:
敏捷
如果本回合中受过由你操控之来源伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
card_faces.flavor_text: 许多神明前来求索熊野自己也不知道的秘密，然而全都无功而返。

あなたが５体以上の改善されているクリーチャーをコントロールしているかぎり、昇る星の残影は＋５/＋５の修整を受けトランプルを持つ。（装備品やあなたがコントロールしているオーラがついているかカウンターが置かれているクリーチャーは改善されている。）
